sentence: He  says  it's  too  early  to  say  where  the  current  conflict  will  go,  though  many  Israelis  believe  Israeli  politics  are  more  likely  to  move  to  the  right  than  the  left  in  the  wake  of  Hamas'  attack,  which  killed  some  1,400  people  in  Israel  and  resulted  in  more  than  220  hostages  taken.
